name: part_003
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2023】3Dバラエティ！あびゃびゃ！全国おいしい発見！～高級食材で牛丼づくりに挑む～【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [Si2W-gcT1Lw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Introduction of the 'great father' bull, Tajiri-go, and the first quiz question about his offspring.
MC Kanata explains the rules of the quiz and the 'Member' betting system in the studio.
The participants write down their answers and Flare shows her guess of 120.

subtitles.original: 黒毛和牛の99.9%が但馬牛の血を引いている
subtitles.english: 99.9% of Japanese Black cattle carry Tajima cattle blood.

subtitles.original: 但馬牛という品種を生んだ田尻号
subtitles.english: Tajiri-go, the bull that gave rise to the Tajima breed.

subtitles.original: 但馬牛の元牛となったのが、田尻号という牛なのですが...
subtitles.english: The bull that became the sire of Tajima cattle was one named Tajiri-go...

subtitles.original: それでは、この牛舎の前で、クエスチョンです！
subtitles.english: Now then, in front of this cattle shed, here's a question!

subtitles.original: Q. 田尻号は生涯で何頭の子孫を残した？
subtitles.english: Q. How many offspring did Tajiri-go leave in his lifetime?

subtitles.original: 田尻号ですが、生涯で何頭の子孫を残したでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Regarding Tajiri-go, how many offspring did he leave in his lifetime?

subtitles.original: みんな、わかるかな～？
subtitles.english: Does everyone know?

subtitles.original: わかるかな～？
subtitles.english: Does everyone know?

subtitles.original: 田尻号って単体だよね？一人で何匹産んだかって話だよね？
subtitles.english: Tajiri-go is a single individual, right? So it's about how many he sired by himself?

subtitles.original: そうです。あびゃ！
subtitles.english: That's right. Abya!

subtitles.original: この問題含めて、これから計3問ほどクイズが出ます、皆さん。
subtitles.english: Including this problem, there will be a total of about three quiz questions from now on, everyone.

subtitles.original: 1問正解できたら1ptゲットで、
subtitles.english: If you get one correct, you get 1 point, and...

subtitles.original: 合計5ptゲットできたら牛丼を食べる権利が与えられますが...
subtitles.english: if you get a total of 5 points, you'll be given the right to eat a beef bowl...

subtitles.original: え、なんかおかしくね？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't that a bit weird?

subtitles.original: 分かりましたか？やはり突っ込まれるんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Did you notice? I thought someone would point it out.

subtitles.original: 賢い皆さんはすぐに分かる。クイズの数と合計ptが合っていませんよね。
subtitles.english: You clever people noticed right away. The number of quizzes and the total points don't match, do they?

subtitles.original: 安心してください。皆さんにはあらかじめ2体の団員さんが与えられております！
subtitles.english: Rest assured. You have all been given two 'Members' in advance!

subtitles.original: え、どういうこと？あ！団員さん出てきた！ニョキニョキじゃん！
subtitles.english: Wait, what do you mean? Oh! The members appeared! They popped up!

subtitles.original: ということでね、この団員さんでございますが、
subtitles.english: So, regarding these members...

subtitles.original: クイズの回答に自信がありましたら、
subtitles.english: if you are confident in your quiz answer...

subtitles.original: 団員さんをマックス2体までBET、賭けることができます！
subtitles.english: you can BET or wager up to two of them!

subtitles.original: そして賭けて正解した場合、1体につき2倍のポイントがゲットできます！
subtitles.english: And if you wager and get it right, you'll get double the points for each!

subtitles.original: 団員さんは使い回しでまたBET出来る訳ではないので、使い所は要検討。
subtitles.english: You can't reuse the members to bet again, so consider carefully when to use them.

subtitles.original: ここが絶対に当てるっていう時に、ぜひね使ってみてください。
subtitles.english: When you're absolutely sure you'll get it right, please do give it a try.

subtitles.original: 不正解の場合は、BETした団員さんの数だけ没収となります！
subtitles.english: In case of an incorrect answer, as many members as you bet will be confiscated!

subtitles.original: いなくなりますから、そこから。消えます。
subtitles.english: They'll be gone from there. They'll disappear.

subtitles.original: 一旦団員さんはしまっちゃおうね。バイバイ。
subtitles.english: Let's put the members away for now. Bye-bye.

subtitles.original: ということで、それでは。団員さんをBETしたいという方は、
subtitles.english: And so, then. Those who want to bet members...

subtitles.original: 回答後にBETするか否かを教えてください。
subtitles.english: please let me know whether you'll bet or not after answering.

subtitles.original: 5ptゲットを目指して皆さん頑張りましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's all do our best aiming for 5 points!

subtitles.original: おー！頑張るぞ！イエーイ！牛丼のため！
subtitles.english: Oh! Let's do it! Yay! For the sake of beef bowls!

subtitles.original: ま、ちなみに司会の僕はクイズしなくても食べられますよね？牛丼。
subtitles.english: Well, by the way, as the host, I can eat beef bowls even without doing the quiz, right?

subtitles.original: いやそれは勿論ですよ。あびゃ！よかった！
subtitles.english: No, of course you can. Abya! Glad to hear it!

subtitles.original: え、ずるくね？やったーじゃねえよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't that unfair? Don't 'yay' me!

subtitles.original: え？知ってる？お前聞いてるんだろ答え！なんで参加してんだよ！
subtitles.english: Huh? You know? You've heard the answer, haven't you! Why are you participating then!

subtitles.original: だって... こっちのほうが楽しそうだって思ったんだもん！
subtitles.english: But... I thought this side looked more fun!

subtitles.original: 答えさせるや！
subtitles.english: Let me answer!

subtitles.original: 全問正解は当たり前だよね、団長はね、そうなると。
subtitles.english: Getting every question right is a given for the Captain, then.

subtitles.original: も、もちろん。まあでも5点目指し...
subtitles.english: O-Of course. Well, but aiming for 5 points...

subtitles.original: ルール説明もできましたので、早速、回答記入タイムに入ります。どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Now that the rules have been explained, we'll head straight into the answer entry time. Go!

subtitles.original: 子孫、子孫。田尻号は13年間で何頭子孫を残した？
subtitles.english: Offspring, offspring. How many offspring did Tajiri-go leave in 13 years?

subtitles.original: 13年だよ！13年！長いです。
subtitles.english: It's 13 years! 13 years! That's a long time.

subtitles.original: ちなみに田尻号はですね、オスの牛さん、雄牛でございますから...
subtitles.english: By the way, Tajiri-go is a male cow, a bull...

subtitles.original: はいはいはい、仕込むってことね。種をね。
subtitles.english: Right, right, right, so he 'seeds' them. The seeds.

subtitles.original: 和牛の偉大なる父と呼ばれている。
subtitles.english: He is called the great father of Wagyu.

subtitles.original: 13年の間で何頭の子孫を残したか、ということでございますから。
subtitles.english: So it's about how many offspring he left in those 13 years.

subtitles.original: いや～たくさんいてほしいな～。たくさんいてほしい...
subtitles.english: Man, I hope there are many of them. I want there to be many...

subtitles.original: どういう感想ぺこよ... バキバキ。
subtitles.english: What kind of feedback is that, peko... Baki baki.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、記入はどうですか？できましたか？
subtitles.english: Everyone, how is the writing going? Are you done?

subtitles.original: はい。できました！お願いします！
subtitles.english: Yes. Done! Please go ahead!

subtitles.original: はい、それでは皆さん記入できたようなので。
subtitles.english: Alright, it seems everyone's finished writing.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、まず団長以外の3人の回答を。
subtitles.english: Then, first the answers of the three besides the Captain.

subtitles.original: 一斉に表示していきましょう。どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's display them all at once. Go!

subtitles.original: これぐらいかな。無限！
subtitles.english: About this much. Infinity!

subtitles.original: 何？無限？バカじゃないの！何でだよ！
subtitles.english: What? Infinity? Are you stupid! Why!

subtitles.original: 数えられねえんだよ、基本的に！
subtitles.english: You basically can't count them!

subtitles.original: 13年間でもう終わってんの！一匹一匹数えてられませんよ！
subtitles.english: After 13 years, it's already over! You can't count them one by one!

subtitles.original: え、確かに。血が入っていれば何でもいいよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, true. If they have the blood, anything goes!

subtitles.original: 数えられるわけねーじゃん！
subtitles.english: There's no way you can count them!

subtitles.original: どこで産んでるかなんて分かんないところだってあるかもしれないんだから！
subtitles.english: Because there might be places where they're born and we don't even know!

subtitles.original: そうだよ！おバカ！数字書いてんじゃねえよ！
subtitles.english: That's right! Stupid! Stop writing numbers!

subtitles.original: ではフレアさんの回答からちょっと見ていきましょう。120ということで。
subtitles.english: Then, let's take a look at Flare-san's answer. It's 120.

subtitles.original: 希望的観測を込めたんだけど、少なかったかもしれない。120くらいかなと。
subtitles.english: I put some wishful thinking into it, but it might be too low. Maybe about 120.

subtitles.original: 自信ありますか？全然ないです。
subtitles.english: Are you confident? Not at all.

subtitles.original: 基準がどれぐらいなんだろうっていうのが分からないけど...
subtitles.english: I don't know what the baseline would be...

subtitles.original: じゃあこれは団員さんBETはしま...？せんっ！
subtitles.english: So, will you bet any members...? I won't!

subtitles.original: せんか。なるほど。それじゃあ次は無限大のぺこら先輩。
subtitles.english: You won't. I see. Then next, infinity for Pekora-senpai.

subtitles.original: だってお牛さんでいちいちそんな誰と誰が... みたいな...
subtitles.english: Because they're cows, and one by one, who with whom... like...

subtitles.original: 照れてんじゃねーよ！
subtitles.english: Don't act all shy!
